Title: Kyokujitsu no Kantai
Description: ['In Kyokujitsu no Kantai, Japan builds up on its success in the earlier series by expanding its blue-water capabilities to reach the Atlantic Ocean, challenging the Kriegsmarine in the process. Nazi Germany also launches a surgical strike on the White House and the Japanese fleet repels a German invasion of Britain.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Source: ', http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Konpeki_no_Kantai]
